name: Amazon EC2 C5n Instances
short: High compute capacity instances on AWS EC2 that offer high network bandwidth for network-intensive workloads.
description: Amazon EC2 C5n Instances are part of the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) service, providing high-performance computing that can handle network intensive workloads. They offer up to 100 Gbps of network bandwidth, providing increased throughput for network-bound applications. Ideal for applications like high-performance web servers, microservices, batch processing, and ad serving. They are powered by custom second-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors, offering both scalability and cost-effectiveness.
